incidents.name: UI Irregularities in the EU Region

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to work to restore network connectivity between New Relic and a cloud service provider. We are seeing recovery for some affected services and will be providing an update once system stability has been ensured. Meanwhile, some customers in the EU region may still be experiencing issues with login or viewing some UI elements.

affected_components.name: UI : Europe - Auto-Telemetry with Pixie : EU
UI : Europe - AWS Lambda Integration : Europe

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to investigate a network connectivity issue between New Relic and a cloud service provider that may be preventing some users in the EU region from logging into the New Relic platform and loading some UI elements.

affected_components.name: UI : Europe - Auto-Telemetry with Pixie : EU

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to investigate a network connectivity issue between New Relic and a cloud service provider that may be preventing some users in the EU region from logging into the New Relic platform and loading some UI elements.

incident_updates.body: We have identified a network connectivity issue between New Relic and a cloud service provider that may be preventing some users in the EU region from logging into the New Relic platform and loading some UI elements. We're continuing to investigate with our upstream provider and will provide updates on this page as they become available.

affected_components.name: UI : Europe - Auto-Telemetry with Pixie : EU
UI : Europe - AWS Lambda Integration : Europe

incident_updates.body: Some users in the EU region may be experiencing difficulties logging in to the New Relic platform and some UI elements may not be loading as expected. We're investigating and will provide additional details as they become available.

affected_components.name: UI : Europe - Auto-Telemetry with Pixie : EU

incident_updates.body: We are investigating a potential service interruption that may impact some customers. Please continue to monitor this page for updates.
